name: Airplane Craft War . Flight Combat Simulator
name_original: Airplane Craft War . Flight Combat Simulator
description:
◉ AIRPLANE WAR GAME! ◉

◉ FIGHT WITH OTHER AIRPLANES! ◉

◉ EXPLOSIONS! SHOOTING! ◉

It is time to pick your war plane and fly to skies!

You can choose between beautiful historical cube airplanes!

This is a great aircraft game! You can fly against other pilots around the world!

In this game we have:

◉ Score tables!
◉ Explosions!
◉ Beautiful block art!
◉ Shoot!
◉ Turbo!
◉ Intense battles!

Jump on the fighter airplane and be the best in world!

Who will win? Will it be you?!

Follow us on Twitter: @bravocterogames
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
